item.title: ryanoasis/nerd-fonts
item.description: Iconic font aggregator, collection, & patcher. 3,600+ icons, 50+ patched fonts: Hack, Source Code Pro, more. Glyph collections: Font Awesome, Material Design Icons, Octicons, & more

item.description: Font lengths tester by generating pngs of each font and sorting by length automatically

item.title: SorkinType/VICWANTSchoolhandAustralia
item.description: This font family is made to support handwriting instruction as offered in Western Australia, Northwest Territory, and Victoria, Australia
